isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - V REF VOLTAGE REFERENCE - ECM VOLTAGE REFERENCE DIAGNOSTICS

svcproc.title: ECM VOLTAGE REFERENCE DIAGNOSTICS
svcproc.para: If multiple sensor codes are set, it is possible that the V REF signal circuit is open or the return signal circuit is open. Follow troubleshooting procedures to determine if V REF circuits are at fault. The engine will not run without a valid V REF signal.
